title: Interior Minister condemns Indian-sponsored terrorist attack on school bus near Khuzdar
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 21 (APP): Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has strongly condemned the attack by Indian-sponsored terrorists on a school bus near Khuzdar Zero Point.
He expressed deep sorrow and grief over the loss of childrenâ€™s lives in the incident.
He extended heartfelt condolences to the families of the deceased children, stating that the beasts who targeted innocent children do not deserve any leniency.
The Minister said that Indian-sponsored terrorists committed a barbaric act by attacking innocent children, and the attack on the school bus is a heinous conspiracy aimed at destabilizing the country.
Mohsin Naqvi emphasized that with national unity, every conspiracy will be thwarted. He stated that the nation stands with the bereaved families of the children and that their full sympathies are with the families of the deceased and the injured.
He also prayed for the swift recovery of the injured.
